meanings.definition: To serve drinks at a bar.
meanings.sent1: I bartend at the local pub on weekends.
meanings.sent2: She will bartend at the party tonight.
meanings.sent3: Why don't you bartend at the beach bar for a change?
meanings.sent4: His words bartend to soothe her troubled mind.
meanings.sent5: The way he bartends with a smile always brightens the atmosphere.

meanings.sent1: My friend decided to bartend after college.
meanings.sent2: They will bartend at the new club downtown.
meanings.sent3: I never thought I would bartend, but here I am mixing drinks!
meanings.sent4: She bartends with grace and skill, making every cocktail a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The bartender's ability to bartend efficiently impressed the customers.
